## Options.should\_throw\_if\_namespace\_not\_in\_DEBUG property

Whether the debug logger should throw an error when the `namespace` string is not included in the `DEBUG` environment variable. This option has no effect on the JSON logger.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
should_throw_if_namespace_not_in_DEBUG?: boolean;
```
